Sentencas: High-purity uniform powders of zirconia-based solid electrolytes stabilized with yttria (4 and 8 mol %) are synthesized by co-precipitation with subsequent annealing at different temperatures.
Titulo: Stabilized Zirconia-Based Nanostructured Powders for Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The obtained powders were studied using X-ray analysis and transmission electron microscopy; the specific surface area was measured by nitrogen adsorption.
Titulo: Stabilized Zirconia-Based Nanostructured Powders for Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The stabilized zirconia powder sintering was studied over temperature range from 1000 to 1600 degrees C.
Titulo: Stabilized Zirconia-Based Nanostructured Powders for Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of samples containing 8 mol % of yttria was 0.06-0.07 S/Nm, that is comparable with that obtained with commercial solid electrolytes.
Titulo: Stabilized Zirconia-Based Nanostructured Powders for Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
